verses.1: Topa aw, bang hangin gamla din na hi hiam? Haksat hunin bang hangin nang bucip khong na hi hiam?
verses.2: Migilote in kiphatsakna tawh mizawngte uuk delh uh hi. Amau ngaihsut vaihawmna mahah amaute awksak in.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh migilo in a lungsim deihna kisaktheih pih a, ngahna dingah a huaiham pa in Topa phuisamin a taisan hi.
verses.4: Migilo in kiphatsakna lungsim nei a, Topa zong lo hi. Ama ngaihsutna khempeuh ah, “Pasian om kei,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Ahihna khempeuh ah a maa pai ngitnget hi. Na thukhennate khempeuh ama muhna in a bat zawh lohin sang mahmah a, a galte khempeuh ahihleh amah in nehpik san lel hi.
verses.6: A lungsim sungah, “Kiliing ngei kei ning; khang tawntungin kamsiatna tuak kei ning,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
verses.7: Ama kampaute pen hamsia, khemna le netniamna tawh kidim a, siatna le man lohna bekbek thugenin a nei tawntung hi.
verses.8: Khuaneute sungah mi a buksimin tu a, munbu kawmah mawhnei lote a that hi. Ama mit in mi tuahsiate ensim a,
verses.9: humpinelkai in a kuahawm sung pan a buk bangin amah in buksimin, mizawngte a man dingin buk a, a ngenthang sungah mizawngte kai-in a man hi.
verses.10: A thatang hat thu tawh mi tuahsia mi sucipin a puk suksak hi.
verses.11: Ama lungsim sungah, “Hih thute pen Pasian in mangngilh hi; a mai seel hi, en lo ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
verses.12: Tho in, Topa! Pasian aw, na tha hong san inla, a thuakte mangngilh kei in.
verses.13: Bang hangin migilo in Pasian simmawh a, a lungsim sungah, “Hong thei kei naʼn teh,” ci ahi hiam?
verses.14: Nangmah in na mu hi. Na huh theih nadingin haksatna le gimna a thuakte na ciamteh hi. A tuahsia mi in nangma tungah ama pumpi hong ap a, pa nei lote a huhpa na hi hi.
verses.15: Giloin siatna a bawlteʼ khut kuaitan gawp inla, siatna a bawl zo nawn lo dingin gim pia in.
verses.16: Topa, a tawntungin kumpi hi a, ama leitang panin minam dangte bei mang ding hi.
verses.17: Topa aw, lungnemteʼ deihna na ngai ding hi. A lungsim uh na hatsak dinga, na bil na ngat ding hi.
verses.18: Pa nei lote le netniamna a thuakte tungah nang na thutang a, leitung mite in launa tuak kha nawn lo ding uh hi.
